languages.text: "Сейчас Ирлиэт принесет свои извинения перед всеми, кто пострадал от ее деяния. И этого будет достаточно".
"Yrliet will now apologise to everyone who was harmed by her deed. And that will be enough."
languages.original_text: "Сейчас Ирлиэт принесет свои извинения перед всеми, кто пострадал от ее деяния. И этого будет достаточно".

traits.locale_text: "Yrliet will now apologise to everyone who were harmed by her deed. And that will be enough."
"Yrliet will now apologise to everyone who were harmed by her deed. And that will be enough."
"Yrliet will now apologise to everyone who was harmed by her deed. And that will be enough."
"Yrliet will now apologise to everyone who was harmed by her deed. And that will be enough."
"Yrliet will now apologise to everyone who was harmed by her deed. And that will be enough."

languages.text: “伊莉耶特要就她的不当行为，向所有因此而受到伤害的人道歉。在此之后，这件事情就到此为止了。”
languages.original_text: "Yrliet will now apologise to everyone who was harmed by her deed. And that will be enough."

traits.locale_text: “伊莉耶特要就她的不当行为，向所有因此而受到伤害的人道歉。在此之后，这件事情就到此为止了。”

languages.text: «Yrliet va a pedir disculpas a todos los que se vieron agraviados por sus actos. Y con eso bastará».
languages.original_text: "Yrliet will now apologise to everyone who was harmed by her deed. And that will be enough."

traits.locale_text: «Yrliet va a pedir disculpas a todos los que se vieron agraviados por sus actos. Y con eso bastará».

languages.text: « Yrliet va présenter ses excuses à tous ceux qui ont été affectés par ses agissements, puis l'affaire sera close. »
languages.original_text: "Yrliet will now apologise to everyone who was harmed by her deed. And that will be enough."

traits.locale_text: « Yrliet va présenter ses excuses à tous ceux qui ont été affectés par ses agissements, puis l'affaire sera close. »

languages.text: "Yrliet wird sich jetzt bei allen entschuldigen, die durch ihr Handeln Nachteile erlitten haben. Und damit ist die Sache beendet."
languages.original_text: "Yrliet will now apologise to everyone who was harmed by her deed. And that will be enough."

traits.locale_text: "Yrliet wird sich jetzt bei allen entschuldigen, die durch ihr Handeln Nachteile erlitten haben. Und damit ist die Sache beendet."

languages.text: 「ユリエットはこれから、自身の行為によって被害を受けたすべての人に謝罪する。それで十分だろう」
languages.original_text: "Yrliet will now apologise to everyone who was harmed by her deed. And that will be enough."

traits.locale_text: 「ユリエットはこれから、自身の行為によって被害を受けたすべての人に謝罪する。それで十分だろう」

languages.text: "Yrliet, yaptıkları yüzünden zarar gören herkesten özür dileyecek. Bu kadarı yeterli."
languages.original_text: "Yrliet will now apologise to everyone who was harmed by her deed. And that will be enough."

traits.locale_text: "Yrliet şimdi yaptıkları yüzünden hasar verdiği herkesten özür dileyecek. Bu kadarı yeterli."
